publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3648 Angela Constance: Congratulations to WELFEHD—That the Parliament congratulates the West Lothian Food and Health Development (WELFEHD) on its recent award of £915,978 from the Growing Community Assets programme of the Big Lottery Fund, which will allow it to purchase new premises and expand its operations; notes that the project will continue to offer quality fruit and vegetables to over 6,000 people from West Lothian with inadequate access to affordable produce; welcomes WELFEHD’s efforts in buying local produce, which benefits local farmers and the local economy; welcomes the project’s creation of volunteer and employment opportunities for individuals who have a history of unemployment, giving them the skills and confidence that they need to move to the wider workplace, and wishes the project continued success. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Alasdair Allan*, Patrick Harvie*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3648 Congratulations to WELFEHD (lodged on 9 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Aileen Campbell*, Ian McKee*, John Park*, Kenneth Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jamie Hepburn*, Robin Harper*
